name: id
desc: Unique ID of building for joining with apartments

name: new
desc: Whether it is an old or new building

name: constructed
desc: Year when the building was constructed

name: material
desc: Primary building material used in building

name: stories
desc: Total number of floors in the building

name: elevator_without
desc: Whether the building has apartments without elevator access

name: elevator_passenger
desc: Whether the building has apartments with passenger elevator access

name: elevator_service
desc: Whether the building has apartments with service elevator access

name: garbage_chute
desc: Whether the building has a garbage chute system

name: heating
desc: Primary heating system used in the building
